name: One Night With Baba Yaga: A Gnosis Tale
name_original: One Night With Baba Yaga: A Gnosis Tale
description:
You are Clara, a young woman desperate to save her family. You've exhausted all options except one: seek the fabled Mother of All Witches, Baba Yaga. 

The witch offers to help you... if you can survive a night in her hut. But you won't just have to survive the monsters and miscreants within... you must find Baba Yaga's personal chambers. Only then can you make your case. It is a dire, hopeless situation...

You're only armed with a dagger, some spells, and maybe a rat. 

The rat CAN talk and cast spells, though. And there's a chicken with a spear. Oh, and a there's cat that will help to prove itself to what may be the Egyptian goddess Bast. 

...And that's just the first six rooms.

Explore Baba Yaga's hut to uncover the wonders of the Dreamlands and piece together an unexpected mystery that throws everything you see into question...

Total Game Time: 1.5-3 hours
